btrplace.plan.event

Class AllocateEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • btrplace.plan.event.AllocateEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Event, VMEvent

    public class AllocateEvent
extends Object
implements VMEvent
    A event to notify a VM requires a new resource allocation.
    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier
